subject: Password Reset Request for Your Account

body.text:
Hi there,

We received a request to reset the password for your Google Account (user@example.com).

To reset your password, click the link below:
https://accounts.google.com/reset-password?token=abc123xyz789

This link expires in 1 hour.

If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

Why you received this email:
We take security seriously. This email confirms that someone (hopefully you) requested a password reset.

Thanks,
The Google Accounts team
